document_data.caption: A map showing the Trail Gate in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Trail Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Trail Gate''' was one of two entry points into the portion of [[Zhentil Keep]] located on the northern banks of the [[River Tesh]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Trail Gate was located in northwest Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The [[Zhentilar Trail]] outside of the city merged with [[Wyvern Road]] at the Trail Gate.
document_data.Defenses: The gate was flanked by a pair of guard towers. Furthermore, a [[Zhentilar]] guardpost was located just inside the gate.
document_data.Activities: The Trail Gate provided access to northwestern Zhentil Keep via the Zhentilar Trail.
